name: Pokesniper Pro - tracker (UGC) for Pokemon Go
name_original: Pokesniper Pro - tracker (UGC) for Pokemon Go
description:
Pokesniper Pro is a helper in hard process of exploring your town and finding pokemons.

We help you to find them without unneedless risk. Now you do not need to hang about dysfunctional and dangerous regions to find nothing. You have to go where somebody had ever catch the pokemon.

Every user can make his own marks on the map and leave comments about marks. You can mention some useful information in text field near the mark to help others to find pokemons without waste of time and unnecessary risks.

We just hope it will help you to enjoy the game.

—------------------Disclaimer-------------------
This application wouldn't help you to cheat or do whatever you want while sitting at home. You have to go outside and seek pokemons.

This application is an unofficial app for Pokemon Go. It is not affiliated with the game creator. "Pokemon" is a trademark of Nintendo.
This application acts only as a helper for players.

(!) Pls pay attention that Pokemon locations may be user-generated (USC)
